description:
Comfy boxers that also perform. The luxuriously soft Tencel Modal that BN3TH is known for is mixed with performance polyester, creating a boxer that works hard when you're sweating and feels great when you're chilling. The MyPakage 3D pouch cradles you from every angle, and a pucker panel eliminates seams in sensitive areas to prevent discomfort.

  • Polyester and Modal blend is wicking and super-soft
  • Ionic+™ permanent silver anti-odour treatment prevents smells
  • MyPakage technology 3-dimensional pouch provides excellent support
  • Pucker panel ensures your sensitive areas stay comfortable
  • Premium waistband is sewn directly to the body for long-lasting durability
  • 6.5 in. inseam
name: BN3TH Infinite Ionic Boxer Briefs - Men's
